f1=x/2.87E5+Kso==3.5
f2=(x-1.12E5)/4.71E5+Kso==6
Solve[{f1,f2},{x,Kso}]

x/2.87*y1=3.5
(x-1.12)/1.75*y1*0.95+0.01*y2+0.04*y3=6
(x-0.83)/2.04*y1*0.72+0.04*y2+0.24*y3=4.8
(x+1.84)/4.71*y1*0.85+0.12*y2+0.03*y3=8

x/287000*y1=3.5
x/175000*y1*0.95+0.01*y2+0.04*y3=6
x/204000*y1*0.72+0.04*y2+0.24*y3=4.8
x/471000*y1*0.85+0.12*y2+0.03*y3=8

0.12*x+0.03*y=6.19
0.01*x+0.04*y=0.55
0.04*x+0.24*y=1.26

0.12*x+0.03*y=6.24
0.01*x+0.04*y=0.57
0.04*x+0.24*y=1.17
